posts.title: Due Process of Law Does Not Always Require a Trial.

I think illegal aliens should get due process. The process is this: you capture them, you confirm that they are here illegally, you expel them from the country. 

That’s it. That’s the whole process. No other process is “due” these people.

When you get pulled over, a cop checks your ID to make sure you have a drivers license

If you don’t have a driver’s license, you get arrested and hauled to jail

Checking ID is enough due process to take away your liberty

So why isn’t that enough for illegal aliens?
